definition: Magnetic measurements derived from Cryosat-2 platform magnetometers
description: This product contains calibrated magnetic measurements derived from Cryosat-2 platform magnetometers
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
Timestamp,-,Time stamp,1,CDF_EPOCH
Latitude,deg,Position in ITRF: Geocentric latitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Longitude,deg,Position in ITRF: Geocentric longitude,1,CDF_DOUBLE
Radius,m,Position in ITRF: Geocentric Radius,1,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FGM1,nT,"calibrated magnetic vector from FGM1, in instrument frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FGM2,nT,"calibrated magnetic vector from FGM2, in instrument frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_FGM3,nT,"calibrated magnetic vector from FGM3, in instrument frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC1,nT,"calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM1, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC2,nT,"calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM2, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC3,nT,"calibrated and aligned magnetic vector from FGM3, in NEC (North, East, Center) frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
B_NEC,nT,"calibrated and aligned magnetic vector in NEC (North, East, Center) frame, 5 sample (i.e. 20 second) robust average of all 3 FGM, ",3,CDF_DOUBLE
F,nT,"magnetic field intensity determined from B_NEC, ",1,CDF_DOUBLE
B_mod_NEC,nT,"CHAOS-6 model field (core, crust + magnetosphere), in NEC (North, East, Center) frame",3,CDF_DOUBLE
q_NEC_CRF,-,"Quaternion, transformation: NEC <- CRF",4,CDF_DOUBLE
q_error,-,experimental error indicator of attitude given in Quaternion q_NEC_CRF. Bad attitude if > approx 40,1,CDF_DOUBLE
related_resources: • Olsen, N., Albini, G., Bouffard, J. et al., Magnetic observations from CryoSat-2: calibration and processing of satellite platform magnetometer data. Earth Planets Space 72, 48 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1186/s40623-020-01171-9
